attributes.action: legislate that Parish Councils have more clout where local planning decisions are concerned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local District Council Planning Departments and Planning Committees very often ignore the views and wishes of Parish Councils where planning decisions are made. These decisions affect people in the immediate area and more notice should be taken of the LOCAL view rather that overall policy. I would like to see Parish Councillors invited to be present when planning decisions which affect their immediate soroundings and individual parishes. Too often Planning Committees make decisions solely on local policy without ever visiting the site of the proposed development.
